error_details.explanation: Incorrect final answer. An intermediate value 'roses_needed' (value: 18.0) was reported instead of 'total_cost' (value: 54.0).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 18
This year, Kyle was only able to pick 12/2 = <<12/2=6>>6 roses.
He wants to give his mother 12 x 2 = <<12*2=24>>24 roses.
He still needs another 24 - 6 = <<24-6=18>>18 roses.
